juzs.text: 78|1|ve aapas mein kis vishay mein prashn kar rahe hain
78|2|bahut badee soochana ke vishay mein.
78|3|jisamen matabhed kar rahe hain.
78|4|nishchay ve jaan lenge.
78|5|phir nishchay ve jaan lenge.
78|6|kya hamane dharatee ko paalana nahin banaaya
78|7|aur parvaton ko mekh
78|8|tatha tumhen jode-jode paida kiya.
78|9|tatha tumhaaree nidra ko sthirata (aaraam) banaaya.
78|10|aur raat ko vastr banaaya.
78|11|aur din ko kamaane ke lie banaaya.
78|12|tatha hamane tumhaare oopar saat drdh aakaash banaaye.
78|13|aur ek damakata deep (soory) banaaya.
78|14|aur baadalon se moosalaadhaar varsha kee.
78|15|taaki usase ann aur vanaspati upajaayen.
78|16|aur ghane-ghane baag.
78|17|nishchay nirnay (faisale) ka din nishchit hai.
78|18|jis din soor mein phoonka jaayega. phir tum dalon hee dalon mein chale aaoge.
78|19|aur aakaash khol diya jaayega, to usamen dvaar hee dvaar ho jaayenge.
78|20|aur parvat chala diye jaayenge, to ve marichika ban jaayenge.
78|21|vaastav mein, narak ghaat mein hai.
78|22|jo duraachaariyon ka sthaan hai.
78|23|jisamen ve asankhy varshon tak rahenge.
78|24|usamen thanadee tatha pey (peene kee cheez) nahin chakhenge.
78|25|sivaaye garm paanee aur peep rakt ke.
78|26|ye poora-poora pratiphal hai.
78|27|nihsandeh ve haisaab kee aasha nahin rakhate the.
78|28|tatha ve hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaate the.
78|29|aur hamane sab vishay likhakar surakshit kar liye hain.
78|30|to chakho, ham tumhaaree yaatana adhik hee karate rahenge.
78|31|vaastav mein, jo darate hain unheen ke lie saphalata hai.
78|32|baag tatha angoor hain.
78|33|aur navayuvati kumaariyaan.
78|34|aur chhalakate pyaale.
78|35|usamen bakavaas aur mithya baaten nahin sunenge.
78|36|ye tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se bharapoor puraskaar hai.
78|37|jo aakaash, dharatee tatha jo unake beech hai, sabaka ati karunaamay paalanahaar hai. jisase baat karane ka ve saahas nahin kar sakenge.
78|38|jis din rooh (jibreel) tatha farishte panktiyon mein khade honge, vahee baat kar sakega jise rahamaan (allaah) aagya dega aur saheeh baat karega.
78|39|vah din nihsandeh hona hee hai. atah jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or (jaane ka) thikaana bana le.
78|40|hamane tumhen sameep yaatana se saavadhaan kar diya, jis din insaan apana karatoot dekhega aur kaafir (vishvaasaheen) kahega ki kaash main mittee ho jaata
79|1|shapath hai un farishton kee jo doobakar (praan) nikaalate hain
79|2|aur jo saralata se (praan) nikaalate hain.
79|3|aur jo tairate rahate hain.
79|4|phir jo aage nikal jaate hain.
79|5|phir jo kaary kee vyavastha karate hain.
79|6|jis din dharatee kaanpegee.
79|7|jisake peechhe hee doosaree kamp aa jaayegee.
79|8|us din bahut-se dil dhadak rahe honge.
79|9|unakee aankhen jhukee hongee.
79|10|ve kahate hain ki kya ham phir pahalee sthiti mein laaye jaayenge
79|11|jab ham (bhurabhuree) (khokhalee) asthiyaan (haddiyaan) ho jaayenge.
79|12|unhonne kahaah tab to is vaapasee mein kshati hai.
79|13|bas vah ek jhidakee hogee.
79|14|tab ve akasmaat dharatee ke oopar honge.
79|15|(he nabee!) kya tumhen moosa ka samaachaar pahuncha
79|16|jab pavitr vaadee tuva mein use usake paalanahaar ne pukaara.
79|17|firaun ke paas jao, vah vidrohee ho gaya hai.
79|18|tatha usase kaho ki kya tum pavitr hona chaahoge
79|19|aur main tumhen tumhaare paalanahaar kee seedhee raah dikhaoon, to tum daroge
79|20|phir use sabase bada chinh (chamatkaar) dikhaaya.
79|21|to usane use jhuthala diya aur baat na maanee.
79|22|phir prayaas karane laga.
79|23|phir logon ko ekatr kiya, phir pukaara.
79|24|aur kahaah main tumhaara param paalanahaar hoon.
79|25|to allaah ne use sansaar tatha paralok kee yaatana mein gher liya.
79|26|vaastav mein, isamen usake lie shiksha hai, jo darata hai.
79|27|kya tumhen paida karana kathin hai athava aakaash ko, jise usane banaaya.
79|28|usakee chhat oonchee kee aur chauras kiya.
79|29|aur usakee raat ko andheree tatha din ko ujaala kiya.
79|30|aur isake baad dharatee ko phailaaya.
79|31|aur usase paanee aur chaara nikaala.
79|32|aur parvaton ko gaad diya.
79|33|tumhaare tatha tumhaare pashuon ke laabh ke lie.
79|34|to jab pralay aayegee.
79|35|us din insaan apana karatoot yaad karega.
79|36|aur dekhane vaale ke lie narak saamane kar dee jaayegee.
79|37|to jisane vidroh kiya.
79|38|aur saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikta dee.
79|39|to narak hee usaka aavaas hogee.
79|40|parantu, jo apane paalanahaar kee mahaanata se dara tatha apane aapako manamaanee karane se roka.
79|41|to nishchay hee usaka aavaas svarg hai.
79|42|ve aapase prashn karate hain ki vah samay kab aayega
79|43|tum usakee charcha mein kyon pade ho
79|44|usake hone ke samay ka gyaan tumhaare paalanahaar ke paas hai.
79|45|tum to use saavadhaan karane ke lie ho, jo usase darata hai.
79|46|ve jis din usaka darshan karenge, unhen aisa lagega ki ve sansaar mein ek sandhya ya usake savere se adhik nahin thahare.
80|1|(nabee ne) tyoree chadhaee tatha munh pher liya.
80|2|is kaaran ki usake paas ek andha aaya.
80|3|aur tum kya jaano shaayad vah pavitrata praapt kare.
80|4|ya naseehta grahan kare, jo use laabh detee.
80|5|parantu, jo vimukh (nishchint) hai.
80|6|tum unakee or dhyaan de rahe ho.
80|7|jabaki tumapar koee dosh nahin, yadi vah pavitrata grahan na kare.
80|8|tatha jo tumhaare paas daudata aaya.
80|9|aur vah dar bhee raha hai.
80|10|tum usakee or dhyaan nahin dete.
80|11|kadaapi ye na karo, ye (arthaat quraan) ek smrti (yaad dahaanee) hai.
80|12|atah, jo chaahe smaran (yaad) kare.
80|13|maananeey shaastron mein hai.
80|14|jo oonche tatha pavitr hain.
80|15|aise lekhakon (farishton) ke haathon mein hai.
80|16|jo sammaanit aur aadaraneey hain.
80|17|insaan maara jaaye, vah kitana krtaghn (naashukra) hai.
80|18|use kis vastu se (allaah) ne paida kiya
80|19|use veery se paida kiya, phir usaka bhaagy banaaya.
80|20|phir usake lie maarg saral kiya.
80|21|phir maut dee, phir samaadhi mein daal diya.
80|22|phir jab chaahega, use jeevit kar lega.
80|23|vastutah, usane usakee aagya ka paalan nahin kiya.
80|24|insaan apane bhojan kee or dhyaan de.
80|25|hamane moosalaadhaar varsha kee.
80|26|phir dharatee ko cheera phaada.
80|27|phir usase ann ugaaya.
80|28|tatha angoor aur tarakaariyaan.
80|29|tatha zaitoon evan khajoor.
80|30|tatha ghane baag.
80|31|evan phal tatha vanaspatiyaan.
80|32|tumhaare tatha tumhaare pashuon ke lie.
80|33|to jab kaan phaad dene vaalee (pralay) aa jaayegee.
80|34|us din insaan apane bhaee se bhaagega.
80|35|tatha apane maata aur pita se.
80|36|evan apanee patnee tatha apane putron se.
80|37|pratyek vyakti ko us din apanee padee hogee.
80|38|us din bahut se chehare ujjval honge.
80|39|hansate evan prasann honge.
80|40|tatha bahut-se cheharon par dhool padee hogee.
80|41|unapar kaalima chhaee hogee.
80|42|vahee kaafir aur kukarmee log hain.
81|1|jab soory lapet diya jaayega.
81|2|aur jab taare dhumil ho jaayenge.
81|3|jab parvat chalaaye jaayenge.
81|4|aur jab das maheene kee gaabhin oontaniyaan chhod dee jaayengee.
81|5|aur jab van pashu ekatr kar diye jaayenge.
81|6|aur jab saagar bhadakaaye jaayenge.
81|7|aur jab praan jod diye jaayenge.
81|8|aur jab jeevit gaadee gayee kanya se prashn kiya jaayegaah
81|9|ki vah kis aparaadh ke kaaran vadh kee gayee.
81|10|tatha jab karmapatr phaila diye jaayenge.
81|11|aur jab aakaash kee khaal utaar dee jaayegee.
81|12|aur jab narak dahakaee jaayegee.
81|13|aur jab svarg sameep laee jaayegee.
81|14|to pratyek praanee jaan lega ki vah kya lekar aaya hai.
81|15|main shapath leta hoon un taaron kee, jo peechhe hat jaate hain.
81|16|jo chalate-chalate chhup jaate hain.
81|17|aur raat kee (shapath), jab samaapt hone lagatee hai.
81|18|tatha bhor kee, jab ujaala hone lagata hai.
81|19|ye (quraan) ek maanyavar svarg doot ka laaya hua kathan hai.
81|20|jo shaktishaalee hai. arsh (sinhaasan) ke maalik ke paas uchch pad vaala hai.
81|21|jisakee baat maanee jaatee hai aur bada amaanatadaar hai.
81|22|aur tumhaara saathee unmat nahin hai.
81|23|usane use aakaash mein khule roop se dekha hai.
81|24|vah paroksh (gaib) kee baat bataane mein pralobhee nahin hai.
81|25|ye dhikkaaree shaitaan ka kathan nahin hai.
81|26|phir tum kahaan ja rahe ho
81|27|ye sansaar vaasiyon ke lie ek smrti (shaastr) hai.
81|28|tumamen se usake lie, jo sudharana chaahata ho.
81|29|tatha tum vishv ke paalanahaar ke chaahe bina kuchh nahin kar sakate.
82|1|jab aakaash phat jaayega.
82|2|tatha jab taare jhad jaayenge.
82|3|aur jab saagar ubal padenge.
82|4|aur jab samaadhiyaan (qabaren) khol dee jaayengee.
82|5|tab pratyek praanee ko gyaan ho jaayega, jo usane kiya hai aur nahin kiya hai.
82|6|he insaan! tujhe kis vastu ne tere udaar paalanahaar se bahaka diya
82|7|jisane teree rachana kee, phir tujhe santulit banaaya.
82|8|jis roop mein chaaha bana diya.
82|9|vaastav mein tum pratiphal (pralay) ke din ko nahin maanate.
82|10|jabaki tumapar nireekshak (paasabaan) hain.
82|11|jo maananeey lekhak hain.
82|12|ve jo kuchh tum karate ho, jaanate hain.
82|13|nihsandeh, sadaachaaree sukhon mein honge.
82|14|aur duraachaaree narak mein.
82|15|pratikaar (badale) ke din usamen jhonk diye jaayenge.
82|16|aur ve usase bach rahane vaale nahin.
82|17|aur tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|18|phir tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|19|jis din kisee ka kisee ke lie koee adhikaar nahin hoga aur us din sab adhikaar allaah ka hoga.
83|1|vinaash hai dandee maarane vaalon ka.
83|2|jo logon se naap kar len,, to poora lete hain.
83|3|aur jab unhen naap ya tol kar dete hain, to kam dete hain.
83|4|kya ve nahin sochate ki phir jeevit kiye jaayenge
83|5|ek bheeshan din ke lie.
83|6|jis din sabhee, vishv ke paalanahaar ke saamane khade honge.
83|7|kadaapi aisa na karo, nishchay buron ka karm patr "sijjeen" mein hai.
83|8|aur tum kya jaano ki "sijjeen" kya hai
83|9|vah likhit mahaan pustak hai.
83|10|us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie vinaash hai.
83|11|jo pratikaar (badale) ke din ko jhuthalaate hain.
83|12|tatha use vahee jhuthalaata hai, jo maha atyaachaaree aur paapee hai.
83|13|jab unake saamane hamaaree aayaton ka adhyayan kiya jaata hai, to kahate hain: poorvajon kee kalpit kathaayen hain.
83|14|suno! unake dilon par kukarmon ke kaaran lohamal lag gaya hai.
83|15|nishchay ve us din apane paalanahaar (ke darshan) se rok diye jaayenge.
83|16|phir ve narak mein jaayenge.
83|17|phir kaha jaayega ki yahee hai, jise tum mithya maanate the.
83|18|sach ye hai ki sadaachaariyon ke karm patr "illiyyeen" mein hain.
83|19|aur tum kya jaano ki "illiyyeen" kya hai
83|20|ek ankit pustak hai.
83|21|jisake paas sameepavartee (pharishte) upasthit rahate hain.
83|22|nishachay, sadaachaaree aanand mein honge.
83|23|sinhaasanon ke oopar baithakar sab kuchh dekh rahe honge.
83|24|tum unake mukhon se aanand ke chinh anubhav karoge.
83|25|unhen muhar lagee shudhd madira pilaee jaayegee.
83|26|ye muhar kastooree kee hogee. to isakee abhilaasha karane vaalon ko isakee abhilaasha karanee chaahiye.
83|27|usamen tasaneem milee hogee.
83|28|vah ek srot hai, jisase allaah ke sameepavartee piyenge.
83|29|paapee (sansaar mein) eemaan laane vaalon par hansate the.
83|30|aur jab unake paas se guzarate, to aankhen michakaate the.
83|31|aur jab apane parivaar mein vaapas jaate, to aanand lete hue vaapas hote the.
83|32|aur jab unhen (mominon ko) dekhate, to kahate theh yahee bhatake hue log hain.
83|33|jabaki ve unake nireekshak banaakar nahin bheje gaye the.
83|34|to jo eemaan laaye, aaj kaafiron par hans rahe hain.
83|35|sinhaasanon ke oopar se unhen dekh rahe hain.
83|36|kya kaafiron (vishvaas heenon) ko unaka badala de diya gaya
84|1|jab aakaash phat jaayega.
84|2|aur apane paalanahaar kee sunega aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye.
84|3|tatha jab dharatee phaila dee jaayegee.
84|4|aur jo usake bheetar hai, phaink degee tatha khaalee ho jaayegee.
84|5|aur apane paalanahaar kee sunegee aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye.
84|6|he insaan! vastutah, too apane paalanahaar se milane ke lie parishram kar raha hai aur too usase avashy milega.
84|7|phir jis kisee ko usaka karmapatr daahine haath mein diya jaayega.
84|8|to usaka saral haisaab liya jaayega.
84|9|tatha vah apanon mein prasann hokar vaapas jaayega.
84|10|aur jinhen unaka karmapatr baayen haath mein diya jaayega.
84|11|to vah vinaash (mrtyu) ko pukaarega.
84|12|tatha narak mein jaayega.
84|13|vah apanon mein prasann rahata tha.
84|14|usane socha tha ki kabhee palat kar nahin aayega.
84|15|kyon nahin? nishchay usaka paalanahaar use dekh raha tha.
84|16|main sandhya laalima kee shapath leta hoon
84|17|tatha raat kee aur jise vah ekatr kare
84|18|tatha chaand kee, jab vah poora ho jaaye.
84|19|phir tum avashy ek dasha se doosaree dasha mein savaar hoge.
84|20|phir kyon ve vishvaas nahin karate
84|21|aur jab unake paas quraan padha jaata hai, to sajda nahin karate.
84|22|balki kaafir to use jhuthalaate hain.
84|23|aur allaah unake vichaaron ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai.
84|24|atah, unhen duhkhadaayee yaatana kee shubh soochana de do.
84|25|parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie samaapt na hone vaala badala hai.
85|1|shapath hai burjon vaale aakaash kee
85|2|shapash hai us din kee, jisaka vachan diya gaya
85|3|shapath hai saakshee kee aur jisapar saakshy dega
85|4|khaeeyon vaalon ka naash ho gaya
85|5|jinamen bhadakate hue eendhan kee agni thee.
85|6|jabaki ve unapar baithe hue the.
85|7|aur ve eemaan vaalon ke saath jo kar rahe the, use dekh rahe the.
85|8|aur unaka dosh keval yahee tha ki ve prabhaavee prashansa kiye allaah ke prati vishvaas kiye hue the.
85|9|jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ke raajy ka svaamee hai aur allaah sab kuchh dekh raha hai.
85|10|jinhonne eemaan laane vaale nar naariyon ko pareeksha mein daala, phir kshama yaachana na kee, unake lie narak ka dand tatha bhadakatee aag kee yaatana hai.
85|11|vaastav mein, jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar bane, unake lie aise svarg hain, jinake tale naharen bah rahee hain aur yahee badee saphalata hai.
85|12|nishchay tere paalanahaar kee pakad bahut kadee hai.
85|13|vahee pahale paida karata hai aur phir doosaree baar paida karega.
85|14|aur vah ati kshama tatha prem karane vaala hai.
85|15|vah sinhaasan ka mahaan svaamee hai.
85|16|vah jo chaahe karata hai.
85|17|he nabee! kya tumhen senaon kee soochana milee
85|18|firaun tatha samood ko.
85|19|balki kaafir (vishvaasaheen) jhuthalaane mein lage hue hain.
85|20|aur allaah unhen har or se ghere hue hai.
85|21|balki, vah gaurav vaala quraan hai.
85|22|jo lekhapatr (lauhe mahfooz) mein surakshit hai.
86|1|shapath hai aakaash tatha raat mein "prakaash pradaan karane vaale" kee
86|2|aur tum kya jaano ki vah "raat mein prakaash pradaan karane vaala" kya hai
86|3|vah jyotimay sitaara hai.
86|4|pratyek praanee par ek rakshak hai.
86|5|insaan, ye to vichaar kare ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
86|6|uchhalate paanee (veery) se paida kiya gaya hai.
86|7|jo peeth tatha seene ke panjaron ke madhs se nikalata hai.
86|8|nishchay vah, use lautaane kee shakti rakhata hai.
86|9|jis din man ke bhed parakhe jaayenge.
86|10|to use na koee bal hoga aur na usaka koee sahaayak.
86|11|shapath hai aakaash kee, jo barasata hai
86|12|tatha phatane vaalee dharatee kee.
86|13|vaastav mein, ye (quraan) do-took nirnay (faisala) karane vaala hai.
86|14|hansee kee baat nahin.
86|15|vah chaal baazee karate hain.
86|16|main bhee chaal baazee kar raha hoon.
86|17|atah, kaafiron ko kuchh thoda avasar de do.
87|1|apane sarvochch prabhu ke naam kee pavitrata ka smaran karo.
87|2|jisane paida kiya aur theek-theek banaaya.
87|3|aur jisane anumaan lagaakar nirdhaarit kiya, phir seedhee raah dikhaayee.
87|4|aur jisane chaara upajaaya.
87|5|phir use (sukha kar) kooda bana diya.
87|6|(he nabee!) ham tumhen aisa padhaayenge ki bhoologe nahin.
87|7|parantu, jise allaah chaahe. nishchay hee vah sabhee khulee tatha chhipee baaton ko jaanata hai.
87|8|aur ham tumhen saral maarg ka saahas denge.
87|9|to aap dharm kee shiksha dete rahen. agar shiksha laabhadaayak ho.
87|10|darane vaala hee shiksha grahan karega.
87|11|aur durbhaagy usase door rahega.
87|12|jo bheeshan agni mein jaayega.
87|13|phir usamen na marega, na jeevit rahega.
87|14|vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apana shudhdikaran kiya.
87|15|tatha apane paalanahaar ke naam ka smaran kiya aur namaaz padhee.
87|16|balki tum log to saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikata dete ho.
87|17|jabaki aakhirat ka jeevan hee uttm aur sthaayee hai.
87|18|yahee baat, pratham granthon mein hai.
87|19|(arthaat) ibraaheem tatha moosa ke granthon mein.
88|1|kya tere paas pooree srshtee par chha jaane vaalee (kyaamat) ka samaachaar aaya
88|2|us din kitane moonh sahame honge.
88|3|parishram karate thake ja rahe honge.
88|4|par ve dahakatee aag mein jaayenge.
88|5|unhen kholate sote ka jal pilaaya jaayega.
88|6|unake lie kateelee jhaad ke siva, koee bhojan saamagree nahin hogee.
88|7|jo na mota karegee aur na bhookh door karegee.
88|8|kitane mukh us din nirmal honge.
88|9|apane prayaas se prasann honge.
88|10|oonche svarg mein honge.
88|11|usamen koee bakavaas nahin sunenge.
88|12|usamen bahata jal srot hoga.
88|13|aur usamen oonche-oonche sinhaasan honge.
88|14|usamen bahut saare pyaale rakhe honge.
88|15|panktiyon mein galeeche lage honge.
88|16|aur makhmalee qaaleenen bichhee hongee.
88|17|kya vah oonton ko nahin dekhate ki kaise paida kiye gaye hain
88|18|aur aakaash ko ki kis prakaar ooncha kiya gaya
88|19|aur parvaton ko ki kaise gaade gaye
88|20|tatha dharatee ko ki kaise pasaaree gayee
88|21|atah aap shiksha (naseehta) den ki aap shiksha dene vaale hain.
88|22|aap unapar adhikaaree nahin hain.
88|23|parantu, jo munh pherega aur nahin maanega
88|24|to allaah use bhaaree yaatana dega.
88|25|unhen hamaaree or hee vaapas aana hai.
